籤詩版本二:
Ndafumana ubutyebi ephupheni lam ndavuka ndingazazi, ndandicinga ukuba uNanshan ligaba nje.
Ukuba ubuza ngomtshato nokugula, musani ukukhangela iindlela zokuxhasana.
詩意:
Le hexagram imele uphawu lokufumana ubutyebi ephupheni.
Yonke into ililize.
解曰: Izinto zisemanzini. Ubume kunye nobude besithunzi. Bonke bazimisele. Akukho mfuneko yokuxoxa.
籤詩故事一:
◇UMa Chao uleqa uCao
UMa Chao (176-222), igama lembeko uMengqi, wayeyinzalelwane yaseFufeng Maoling (ngoku emntla-mpuma weXingping, kwiPhondo laseShaanxi).
Ngexesha loBukumkani obuThathu, uCao Cao wabulala utata kaMa Chao. UMa Chao waziphindezela wahlasela uCao Cao, kodwa uCao Cao woyiswa wabaleka.
Ukuze angaqondwa ngamajoni kaMa Chao, uCao Cao wakhulula ihempe yakhe ebomvu, wacheba iindevu zakhe zaba mfutshane, waza wabaleka ngehashe.
Ngexesha elinzima, uCao Hong wafika kunye nemikhosi yakhe ngexesha, wamisa uMa Chao, kwaye wasindisa ubomi bukaCao Cao kwisango lesihogo.
(Eli bali lisisafobe sendlela umntu anokuyibaleka ngayo ingozi ngokulahla udumo kunye newonga lakhe.)
聖意: Ukuba ikhaya lakho alikho kwimeko entle, kulumkele ukufuna imali, ukuthintela ukuthengiselana, ukwenza umtshato ube nzima, ukulinda ixesha Liujia uthandazela ukukhuselwa. ukumangalelwa, ukulahlekelwa ngamathamsanqa, ukulahlekelwa yimpahla, izifo ezingenanto, ukuthandazela intsikelelo kaThixo.
